Original program:

```
ANSWERS0=VQA(video=VIDEO,question="How is the man in grey ensuring he can see clearly?")
ANSWER0=SELECT(question="How did the man in grey ensure he can see clearly?",information=ANSWERS0,choices=CHOICES)
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
